document_data.name: Priapurl
document_data.caption: ''Priapurl's location on the Dragon Coast''
document_data.georefs: {{Cite web/More Lake of Steam and Dragon Coast}}
document_data.mainbody: '''Priapurl''' ({{Pronounce|pry|ah|PURL|refs=}}) was a small town located on the [[Trader's Road]].
document_data.Government: As of [[1372 DR]], the ruler of Priapurl was [[Tar Hurara]], who had descended from bandits but was often away from the town spending her time in the court of [[Cormyr]].
document_data.History: In the {{YearlinkName|1365}}, Priapurl became besieged by a one-[[orc]] army [[Slogg Ogrum]]. Slogg by his lonesome managed to almost bring the town to its knees if not for the [[Mindulgulph Mercenary Company]], who eventually slew the threat. Disturbingly enough, no-one even uncovered the reason for the orc's attack. His impressive stash of powerful weapons was the only thing recovered from the siege, including the powerful [[crossbow]] â€“ ''[[Ogrum's Siegebow]]''.
